cast.overview: The story about the men who made the world of technology what it is today, their struggles during college, the founding of their companies, and the ingenious actions they took to build up the global corporate empires of Apple Computer Inc. and Microsoft Corporation.
cast.title: Pirates of Silicon Valley

cast.overview: When the Hulk's presence on Earth becomes too great a risk, the Illuminati trick him to board a shuttle destined for a planet where he will be able to live in peace, and launch it into space. The Hulk's struggle to escape causes the shuttle to malfunction and crash land on the planet Sakaar, however, where he is sold into slavery and trained as a gladiator.
cast.title: Planet Hulk

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Marc Worden (born June 5, 1976) is a Canadian actor. His first film appearance was on two episodes of the television series Katts and Dog and his most recent appearances include a voice role in the films Planet Hulk and 10 Years Later. He is also known for the role that he played as Edward Ray in the early seasons of the beloved "Road to Avonlea" series.

On April 12, 2002, he married Marilisa, and together they have three sons: Nathan, Aidan and Ryder

Description above from the Wikipedia article Marc Worden, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia
details.name: Marc Worden
